mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boxoffices (PERFORMANCEID, RANKING, TITLE, GENRE, POSTER, PLACE, AREA, SEAT, START_DATE, END_DATE) VALUES (#{mt20id}, #{rnum}, SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{prfnm}, IF(LOCATE('[', #{prfnm}), '[', '('), 1), #{cate}, (SELECT CASE WHEN #{cate} = '연극' THEN 'AAAA' WHEN #{cate} = '뮤지컬' THEN 'AAAB' WHEN #{cate} = '무용' THEN 'BBBA' WHEN #{cate} = '클래식' THEN 'CCCA' WHEN #{cate} = '오페라' THEN 'CCCB' WHEN #{cate} = '국악' THEN 'CCCC' WHEN #{cate} = '복합' THEN 'EEEA' ELSE 'XXXX' END) CONCAT('https://kopis.or.kr', #{poster}), #{prfplcnm}, #{area}, #{seatcnt}, REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{prfpd}, '~', 1), '.', '-'), REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{prfpd}, '~', -1), '.', '-'))
